name: scratch-desktop
description: Scratch 3.0 as a self-contained desktop application
author: Scratch Foundation

scripts.compile:cpp32: CXX=arm-linux-gnueabihf-g++ CC=arm-linux-gnueabihf-gcc node ./node_modules/node-gyp/bin/node-gyp.js configure build -C ./cpp && cp ./cpp/build/Release/gpiolib.node ./static/
scripts.compile:cpp64: CXX=g++ CC=gcc node ./node_modules/node-gyp/bin/node-gyp.js configure build -C ./cpp && cp ./cpp/build/Release/gpiolib.node ./static/
scripts.build:dev: npm run compile && npm run doBuild -- --mode=dev
scripts.build:dir: npm run compile && npm run doBuild -- --mode=dir
scripts.build:dist: npm run compile && npm run doBuild -- --mode=dist
scripts.dist:rpi32: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run compile:cpp32 && npm run fetch && npm run doBuild -- --mode=dist --platform=linux32
scripts.dist:rpi64: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run compile:cpp64 && npm run fetch && npm run doBuild -- --mode=dist --platform=linux64
scripts.distDev: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run fetch && npm run doBuild -- --mode=dev
scripts.postinstall: git apply patches/*.patch && cd node_modules/scratch-blocks/ && npm i --ignore-scripts && npm exec -c "python build.py"
